channel.title: ♣♥ Conquest #317 Economy Based Server ♠♦
channel.description:
Welcome to the official advertisement for Conquest-317, this server has been up for the past month and a half now and we recently made the decision to change many of the key things in-game to convert the server from being a basic PK server to being a full-blown economy based server. Many of these updates will be shown below.
[SIZE=3][U][B]Features:[/B][/U][/SIZE]
[ul][*]Starting Out Click Based Training (3000xp per 1000xp HP) [*]Newer Revision Items (Claws, Torva, Etc.) [*]Gambling [*]8GB Dedicated VPS [*]Many Shops (all items obtainable by normal players no donator only items!) [*]Kill/Death Ratio Ranking System In-Game [*]New Smithing System for Trimming Armour [*]Thieving System with merchant for money making [*]Summoning System in Music Tab (bossing) [*]Armour Set Exchange/Creating [*]Pking/Staking/Training for money making [*]Fully Animated NPCs [*]PvM Store [*]PkP Store [*]Safe PkP Store [*]New Skilling Area [*]Slayer System Added [*]Custom RuneScape boss Task system implemented. [*]Greed Perk Addition[/ul]
[SPOILER=Getting Started] Getting Started in Conquest-317 is very easy, simply log-in and select the 'Training Teleport' here you will be able to train on Object(s) to get your Attack, Strength, Magic, Defence, HP, Prayer, and Range.

@davidi2 wrote:

You have to be THE owner of the server to post here, not an advertiser.

Read full topic

item.title: ♣♥ Conquest #317 Economy Based Server ♠♦
item.dc:creator: @Skype1 Skype™
item.description:
@Skype1 wrote:

Welcome to the official advertisement for Conquest-317, this server has been up for the past month and a half now and we recently made the decision to change many of the key things in-game to convert the server from being a basic PK server to being a full-blown economy based server. Many of these updates will be shown below.

[SIZE=3][U][B]Features:[/B][/U][/SIZE]

[ul][]Starting Out Click Based Training (3000xp per 1000xp HP)
[]Newer Revision Items (Claws, Torva, Etc.)
[]Gambling
[]8GB Dedicated VPS
[]Many Shops (all items obtainable by normal players no donator only items!)
[]Kill/Death Ratio Ranking System In-Game
[]New Smithing System for Trimming Armour
[]Thieving System with merchant for money making
[]Summoning System in Music Tab (bossing)
[]Armour Set Exchange/Creating
[]Pking/Staking/Training for money making
[]Fully Animated NPCs
[]PvM Store
[]PkP Store
[]Safe PkP Store
[]New Skilling Area
[]Slayer System Added
[]Custom RuneScape boss Task system implemented.
[*]Greed Perk Addition[/ul]

[SPOILER=Getting Started]
Getting Started in Conquest-317 is very easy, simply log-in and select the ‘Training Teleport’ here you will be able to train on Object(s) to get your Attack, Strength, Magic, Defence, HP, Prayer, and Range.

Read full topic
